name: Finnpartners
description: In December 2011, FINN Partners was born. I served 11 years as the co-CEO of a historic agency that carried my father’s name – and mine. Yet after 30-plus years of working at that firm, I realized I wanted to build something different – something bold, meaningful, and amazing for clients, our colleagues, and the communities in which we operate. “Amazing” was, and is, for me an important word. I imagined we could be “amazing” every day. I aimed to create a place where talented people could gather – virtually or in person – and do big things for clients, and make a difference in the communities important to us.
Headline: Who we are drives everything we do.

enhanced_description: Finnpartners, launched in 2011, is a global, independent integrated marketing and communications agency. Founded with the vision to create a bold, meaningful, and amazing environment for clients, colleagues, and communities, the agency aims to deliver impactful communication solutions. They offer a diverse range of communication services, including brand strategy, content marketing, public relations, and influencer marketing, with a strong commitment to driving positive change for its people, clients, and the world. Finnpartners also supports clients in areas related to HR, such as improving employee happiness and engagement, corporate social responsibility, environmental sustainability, employee well-being, and benefits communication.
